content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> be the function with first derivative given by <math alttext="f prime of x equals, x cubed, times the sine of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>f</mi><mo>′</mo></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></math>. Which of the following is the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-coordinate of a point of inflection of the graph of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> ?
